Package application.server.managers

Class RacesManager

java.lang.Object
application.server.managers.RacesManager
public class RacesManager extends Object
This class deals with the management of sailing club's races.
Author:
Federico Canali

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static RacesManager getInstance()
      The constructor is called only if the static instance is null, so only the first time that the getInstance() method is invoked. All the other times the same instance object is returned.
      Returns:
      the instance object is returned.
